doc:
Anthony Dexter https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Anthony_Dexter 0 Anthony John "Tony" Dexter (January 19, 1913 – March 27, 2001) was an American actor known for his striking resemblance to silent film hero Rudolph Valentino, whom he portrayed in the 1951 biographic Valentino. Dexter sometimes used the pseudonym Walter Craig. He was known for portraying many real-life characters such as Captain John Smith, Captain William Kidd, Billy the Kid and Christopher Columbus. Anthony_John_"_Tony_"_Dexter ( January_19_,_1913 – March_27_,_2001 ) was an_American_actor known for his_striking_resemblance to silent_film_hero_Rudolph_Valentino , whom he portrayed in the_1951_biographic_Valentino . Dexter sometimes_used the_pseudonym_Walter_Craig . He was_known for portraying many_real-life_characters such_as Captain_John_Smith , Captain_William_Kidd , Billy the_Kid_and_Christopher_Columbus .
